instruction: Compose a poem about a person who is facing a difficult situation
output:
Shoulders slumped, head down low 
Feet heavy, mind in a haze
A difficult situation takes its toll
But will not take away his faith.

His heart’s sorrow brings tears to his eyes 
But his courage knows no bounds
He may be struggling, but he stands strong
With a newfound wisdom that he has found.

The darkness of the night lasts only soon
Though he may feel a lack of control
Soon, dawn will break and time will tell
The will to face the future is his goal.
